amendment.description: To direct the Attorney General to make publicly available documents related to Jeffrey Epstein.

action.text: Cloture motion on SA 3849 rendered moot in Senate.
Motion to table amendment SA 3849 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 51 - 49. Record Vote Number: 512.
Cloture motion on SA 3849 presented in Senate.

Amendment SA 3849 proposed by Senator Schumer to language proposed to be stricken by amendment no. 3748. To direct the Attorney General to make publicly available documents related to Jeffrey Epstein.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 3849 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 51 - 49. Record Vote Number: 512.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3849 proposed by Senator Schumer to language proposed to be stricken by amendment no. 3748.
